Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town, the initial personal conflict between the woman in the green hat and the cowboy, and the arrival of the surveyors bringing news of the airport plan, setting the stage for town-level conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon and Cowboy Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the woman in the green hat and the cowboy in Ghost Town, establishing their strained relationship and the woman's conflicting priorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town and Initial Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy's Departure and Airport Announcement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the cowboy's emotional departure from Ghost Town and the unexpected arrival of surveyors with news of the airport, changing the narrative focus to town's future.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Surveyors and the Airport Plan
Cowboy's Shock and the Impending Destruction of Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Growing Town Tension
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan and Cal's romantic relationship amidst the backdrop of Ghost Town's impending changes, introducing new characters and rising tensions within the town.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Parting and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's argument and parting, followed by Nan's internal reflections on love and their relationship dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Parting
Nan's Reflection on Love and Past Hurt

sub_scenes.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Growing Discontent
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new element of tension and potential danger with the arrival of rough men and their resentment towards 'progress' in Ghost Town, culminating in a threatening encounter with Nan.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Discontent with 'Progress'

sub_scenes.title: Businessmen, Father's Scolding, and Nan's Distress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Nan's attempt to engage with the businessmen and her subsequent humiliation and scolding by her father, leading to her emotional distress.

narrative_arcs.title: Businessmen Discuss Airport and Horses, Nan Interjects

sub_scenes.title: Consolation and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene offers Nan comfort from her mother and maid regarding Cal, leading to Nan's decision to confront Cal and seek clarity in their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother and Maid Console Nan About Cal

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Departure and Nan's Loneliness
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's disagreement and Cal's departure, followed by Nan experiencing loneliness in his absence.

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Return and Winter's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks Cal's unexpected return and confession, juxtaposed with the narrative shift to the arrival of harsh winter conditions.

Major_Arcs.title: Winter Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the severe winter storm impacting Ghost Town, the community's worry about livestock, and the hopeful arrival of aid, culminating in Cal's decisive action to help.

sub_scenes.title: Community Worry and Indoor Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the community's growing anxiety about the snowstorm and its impact on livestock, contrasted with a moment of indoor comfort and reassurance.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Crisis and Cal's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene escalates the severity of the snowstorm and shows Cal's decisive resolution to take action and help the community's livestock.

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope, and Fodder Delivery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts between despair and faint hope amidst the relentless snowfall, culminating in the community's relief at the arrival of fodder by plane.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane and Fodder

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Romance and Reality after Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene offers a reflective moment between Nan and Cal after the crisis, considering the impact of harsh realities on romance and their relationship.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Character Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson to the narrative, focusing on his dramatic entrance into town and the varied reactions and opinions of the townspeople towards him, setting up potential conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane Benson's forceful arrival in town and the diverse reactions of the townspeople, ranging from admiration to concern.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Sister's Concern
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Jeff's backstory and his sister's concern about his unhealthy hero worship of their father and his current actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship
Justifying Actions with Clyde Surrett's Example
Dismissing Chane Benson and Embracing Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff's Dangerous Path and Confrontation with Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Jeff's increasingly concerning behavior, his sister's attempts to intervene, and the escalating conflict involving Chane Benson, leading to a dangerous confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Sister's Hopelessness and Plea to Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the sister's despair over Jeff's path and her desperate plea to Clyde for help in guiding Jeff away from danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Expressing Fear and Seeking Help from Clyde
Declaration of Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Reassurance and Promise of Shared Happiness

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit, Introduction of Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Jeff's disappearance, the sister's pursuit, and introduces Mr. Benson as a character providing 'tips', foreshadowing Benson's role.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit to Town
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Seeking Advice
Chane Benson's Menacing Demeanor and Disdain for Young Boys

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the fallout from an article about Benson, Benson's threat against Clyde, and Sally's warnings about Benson's dangerous nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article and Benson's Threat
Warning about Benson's Cunning and Cowardice
Seeking Action from the Editor and Decision to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Editor's Resolve and Dinner Invitation Idea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the editor's firm stance against Benson and introduces the idea of inviting Benson to dinner, driven by Jeff's changing perception.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Unwavering Resolve and Benson's Character
Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation Idea

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath of Dinner and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the morning after the dinner and then transitions to a confrontation between Jeff, Sally and Chane, escalating tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Attempt, Capture and Newspaper Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jeff's failed rescue attempt, Clyde's capture, and then shifts focus to the Clarion office and their response to Benson.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Ranch Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Betsy and Steve, focusing on ranch management, initial tension, developing romance, and confrontation with external threats to the ranch.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Introduction of Steve Daley
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene opens with a ranch confrontation and introduces Steve Daley, hired by Hank, to Betsy, the ranch boss.

sub_scenes.title: Bunk Assignment and Hank's Justification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Steve and Betsy's interaction during bunk assignment and Hank justifying hiring Steve to Betsy.

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Steve's Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves to town where Betsy faces confrontation from men, leading to Steve's intervention and display of force.

sub_scenes.title: Bodyguard Confirmation and Father's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene confirms Steve as Betsy's bodyguard and shows Hank's desperate plea to keep his job, revealing his attachment to the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Job Secured and Gratitude Expressed

sub_scenes.title: Job Conditions and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents Betsy's condition for Steve's job (no guns), leading to a deeper conversation about his identity and culminating in their romantic confessions and embrace.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Choice about Gunfighter Role
Betsy's Change of Heart and Plea to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Bridges' Confrontation and Hank's Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to an external threat with Bridges' arrival and confrontation, escalating to violence, and revealing the tragic backstory of Hank's ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Analysis of the Confrontation as a Declaration of War
Betsy's Assertion of Authority and Gun Ownership
Steve's Reflection, Flashback to Ambush, and Hank's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Steve's determined departure to confront the threat, followed by Betsy's reflection and decision to pursue him to Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the violent confrontation at Devil's Pass, Betsy's intervention and injury, and the subsequent reunion and romantic resolution between Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation
Betsy's Survival and Reunion with Steve

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Contract and Romantic Entanglements
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Carrie, Dave, and Fred's complex relationships, focusing on the Carlton contract, romantic misunderstandings, betrayals, and eventual resolution of Carrie's romantic life.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and Curley's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene opens with an argument about Dave and shifts to Curley's unexpected actions in the corral, introducing new threads.

narrative_arcs.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the fence dispute and escalates into a gunfight, resolving the immediate territorial conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussing the Fence and Range Issues
Fred Gordon's Confrontation at the Fence

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation, Intimacy, and Fred's Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Dave's reconciliation, their intimate conversation, and then Fred Gordon's unexpected reappearance, creating new tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Intimate Conversation and Reflection on Fred

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Private Talk, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie confronting Fred, then having a private conversation with Dave, leading to Carrie's proposal to Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Misunderstandings and Romantic Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract and Betrayal Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the Carlton contract proposition and Carrie's angry confrontation with Dave, accusing him of betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Determined Action and Carlton's Office
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's determination to act against Fred and her arrival at Mr. Carlton's office, setting up a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Inquiry with Dave and Fred
Arrival and Interruption at Carlton's Office

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Carrie's Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the resolution at Carlton's office, Carrie's emotional release with her father, and her final confrontation with Fred, securing her victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Business History and Carrie's Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Independence and Final Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie asserting her independence and rejecting the 'West', followed by her encounter with Dave and final decision regarding Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Independence and Western Identity
Anger, Apology, and Question of Love
Father's Wisdom and Long Ride Home
Accusation of Heartbreak and Eastern Trickery

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Realization and Reunion with Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie reflecting on her father's wisdom and Dave's words, leading to a realization about Fred's true feelings and a romantic reunion with him.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Dave's Words and Embracing Love

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris - Chase, Shooting, and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk and Chris's escape, the relentless pursuit by Rance, the violent confrontation, and the ultimate romantic resolution between Chris and Rance after Dirk's fate is determined.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Plea and True Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene opens with Dirk's desperate plea at Chris's window and reveals the true extent of his injury - a gunshot wound.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to an older man planning investigation and Chris Ransom arriving at a ranch, mistaken for a Marshal.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Search and Blood Stained Pinto

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Duty
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation regarding Dirk's actions, with law asserting duty and a friend proposing to guard Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Resignation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Dirk and a woman in red, depicting their unexpected reunion and a tone of resignation about Dirk's fate.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Pursuit Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Chris and Rance's romantic confessions, leading to a plan to pursue Dirk together.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chase between Dirk, Chris and Rance, culminating in a violent confrontation and shooting.

sub_scenes.title: Departure, Confession, and Dirk's Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dirk and Chris's difficult departure, Chris's confession of love for Rance, and Dirk's successful escape to Mexico.

narrative_arcs.title: The Difficult Departure and Lingering Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Rance's recovery, his emotional reunion with Chris, their mutual confessions of love, and culminating in a marriage proposal and acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Mutual Feelings and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Appearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the wedding day, showing preparations and then Dirk's dramatic and unexpected arrival, disrupting the ceremony.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Concern and Rance's Reassurance about Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Plan and Backstory Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the Marshal's perspective, revealing his plan and then providing backstory and resolution regarding Dirk's past and fate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marshal's Appreciation and Wedding Gift
